opinion.posture: Indictment charging defendant with obstructing highways and other public passages. Before WILLIAMS, Jr., J. Verdict of guilty and judgment of sentence entered. Defendant appealed. Appeal, No. 393, Oct. T., 1976, from Court of Common Pleas of Northampton County, Aug. T., 1975, No. 53. Submitted September 13, 1976.
opinion.attorneys:
Philip D. Lauer, for appellant;
Richard J. Shiroff, Assistant District Attorney, and Charles H. Spaziani, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
